title: Border-Layout
description: Border Layout is the traditional layout based on directions (North, South, East, Center, West).
componentDescription: Border Layout provides Expandable and Collapsible Panels to group components based on a business context. It is a traditional layout structure based on directions North, South, East, Center, and West. Under the hood, this layout is based on CSS3 Grid. Panels (North, South, East, Center, and West) can be expanded and collapsed. Directions (Vertical and Horizontal) of Collapse is available as part of the Grid Layout.
keyFeatures: Color Palette and Gradient feature for Header
Component Life Cycle Events (Initiated, Ready, Destroyed)

gridData.name: Tab
gridData.description: Moves focus to the next focusable element.All focusable elements in the layout are included in the page Tab sequence.

gridData.name: Shift+Tab
gridData.description: Moves focus to the previous focusable element.All focusable elements in the layout are included in the page Tab sequence.

gridData.name: position
gridData.description: Layout the contents to North , East , West , Center & South positions
